title: Professional Mathematics Competency Development Program Through Workplace-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical theory and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Focused on improving mathematical problem-solving skills in real work environments for current professionals. Flexible learning environments structured through personal device usage and collaborative tools

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve complex workplace mathematical problems using situational analysis and modeling techniques
Learners complete at least three projects applying statistical analysis and optimization techniques to real-world tasks for data-driven decision-making
Learners improve problem-solving strategies at least twice through feedback cycles with peers/mentors and document outcomes in reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
